text: The Piano Sonata No. 19 in G minor, Op. 49, No. 1, is a short sonata by Ludwig van Beethoven. It was made public in 1805 but made 10 years earlier. The sonata is eight minutes in long. This sonata, along with No. 20, is sometimes called Leichte Sonaten. == Movements == The sonata has two movements: ==References== Category:Compositions in G minor Piano Sonata 019
title: Piano Sonata No. 19 (Beethoven)
